title: Fix TypeScript 'any' type in privacy-compliance.service.ts
description: Replace all 'any' types with proper interfaces (IPRange, SanitizationResult) to ensure type safety in PII redaction logic.
acceptanceCriteria: All 'any' types in privacy-compliance.service.ts replaced with proper interfaces
PII redaction logic maintains type safety

subtasks.title: Create IPRange interface
subtasks.description: Create IPRange interface with properties: start (string), end (string), single (boolean), range (string), isSensitive (boolean). Move hardcoded IP range values to typed constants.
acceptanceCriteria: Hardcoded IP values moved to IP_RANGE constant

subtasks.title: Create SanitizationResult interface
subtasks.description: Create SanitizationResult interface with properties: result (SanitizationResult), status (success/failure), redacted (string), piiTypes (string[]). Move hardcoded sanitization result values to interface.
acceptanceCriteria: Hardcoded values moved to SANITIZATION_RESULT constant
Sanitization result properly typed with all required fields

subtasks.title: Replace 'any' types with proper interfaces in privacy service
subtasks.description: Replace all 'any' type usage with proper interfaces: IPRange for IP checks, SanitizationResult for PII redaction. Update privacy-compliance.service.ts to use new interfaces instead of 'any'.
acceptanceCriteria: All 'any' types replaced with IPRange interface
PII redaction uses new SanitizationResult interface
Privacy service properly maintains type safety
